languages.text: {n}Кости на доспехе преподобного сверкают золотом, как и полная крови чаша в его руке.{/n} "Благословенны шаги твои, Домин'{name}".
{n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}Кости на доспехе преподобного сверкают золотом, как и полная крови чаша в его руке.{/n} "Благословенны шаги твои, Домин'{name}".

traits.locale_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, and so does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."

languages.text: {n}Die Knochen an der Rüstung des Konfessors sind ebenso vergoldet wie der mit Blut gefüllte Kelch in seiner Hand.{/n} "Gesegnet seien Eure Schritte, Domin {name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Knochen an der Rüstung des Konfessors sind ebenso vergoldet wie der mit Blut gefüllte Kelch in seiner Hand.{/n} "Gesegnet seien Eure Schritte, Domin {name}."

languages.text: {n}Les os ornant l'armure du confesseur ont des reflets d'or, tout comme le calice rempli de sang qu'il tient entre ses mains.{/n} « Bénis soient vos pas, Domin'{name}. »
languages.original_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les os ornant l'armure du confesseur ont des reflets d'or, tout comme le calice rempli de sang qu'il tient entre ses mains.{/n} « Bénis soient vos pas, Domin'{name}. »

languages.text: {n}Los huesos que adornan la armadura del confesor relucen con oro, al igual que el cáliz lleno de sangre que sujeta.{/n} «Benditos sean sus pasos, Domin'{name}».
languages.original_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}Los huesos que adornan la armadura del confesor relucen con oro, al igual que el cáliz lleno de sangre que sujeta.{/n} «Benditos sean sus pasos, Domin'{name}».

languages.text: {n}聴罪師のアーマーを飾る骨は金色に輝き、彼が持つ血の入った聖杯も同色の光を放っている。{/n}「あなたの歩みに祝福あれ、ドミン」{name}
languages.original_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}聴罪師のアーマーを飾る骨は金色に輝き、彼が持つ血の入った聖杯も同色の光を放っている。{/n}「あなたの歩みに祝福あれ、ドミン」{name}

languages.text: {n}告解神父盔甲上的骨头闪闪发光，装满鲜血的圣餐杯也散发着光泽。{/n}“愿祂庇佑您的足迹，秘者{name}。”
languages.original_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."

traits.locale_text: {n}告解神父盔甲上的骨头闪闪发光，装满鲜血的圣餐杯也散发着光泽。{/n}“愿祂庇佑您的足迹，秘者{name}。”

languages.text: {n}Günah çıkarıcının zırhını süsleyen kemikler de, tuttuğu kanla dolu kadeh de altınla parıldıyor.{/n} "Attığınız adımlar kutsanmıştır Domin'{name}."
languages.original_text: {n}The bones adorning the confessor's armour glitter with gold, as does the blood-filled chalice that he is holding.{/n} "Blessed are your steps, Domin'{name}."
